Articles.Content:
Just a little idea to make rocket contruction easier.

We need a shift function, to enable us to connect new pieces to a certain piece of our rocket.

When there are lots of parts on a rocket, sometimes attaching something to the correct part can be a nightmare. It wants to attach to every part around the one you want, but no amount of mouse wiggling will get it into the position you want.

This is especially noticeable with fuel tanks which don't want to connect vertically with other fuel tanks, if there's the possibility of attaching radially to another nearby part.

My suggestion would be toggle button which allows you to select a single part on your existing rocket. Whilst the toggle button is active, that part is the only one new parts can attach to.
I am familiar with that problem and like that idea.
